job_history.work_description: Managed team of 45 professionals. Served as mentor to junior team members. Initiated program that standardized employee training and led to increase in customer satisfaction by 12%.

Informed guests of spa services, programs and activities over the phone and in person. Addressed all guest complaints and referred any escalated situations to management. Coordinated and booked all spa service appointments for individual and group clients.
Advised guests on special events and product promotions. Mailed client forms and salon promotional documents. Informed guests of spa services, programs and activities over the phone and in person.

Informed guests of spa services, programs and activities over the phone and in person. Addressed all guest complaints and referred any escalated situations to management. Researched the various types of spa therapies and treatments to be better informed of spa services.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed a team of 45 professionals, served as a mentor to junior team members, and led a program that standardized employee training, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed a large team of professionals, demonstrating strong leadership and management skills, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Addressed guest complaints, referred escalated situations to management, and informed guests of spa services, programs, and activities, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with guests, team members, and management, demonstrating strong communication skills, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Addressed guest complaints and referred escalated situations to management, showing strong problem-solving skills, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated and booked spa service appointments for individual and group clients, demonstrating strong time management skills, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Advised guests on special events and product promotions, and mailed client forms and salon promotional documents, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Initiated a program that standardized employee training, showing a solid working proficiency in project management.
